thread.title: BRIEF-Luz Saude Buys 70 Pct of Capital Criativo Health Care Investments II

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Luz Saude Buys 70 Pct of Capital Criativo Health Care Investments II

organizations.name: capital criativo health care investments ii

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - LUZ SAUDE SA:
* SAID ON MONDAY SIGNS CONTRACT TO ACQUIRE 70 PCT SHARE CAPITAL AND VOTING RIGHTS OF CAPITAL CRIATIVO HEALTH CARE INVESTMENTS II SA (CCHC2)
* ALREADY HOLDS 10 PCT SHARE CAPITAL AND VOTING RIGHTS OF CCHC2 AND WITH COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION WILL ASSUME A CONTROLLING POSITION IN THIS COMPANYâ€˜S CORPORATE STRUCTURE
Source text: bit.ly/2E0JgCs
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
